title: 「安心出行」Android 版Java Source Code流出

replies.msg: 會員限定
雖然我完全唔知係咩嚟，不過推

quote.msg: 雖然我完全唔知係咩嚟，不過推

replies.msg: 殼都唔加懶到咁？

隔離post抄出嚟

係Google Play Store 搵唔到《安心出行》只搵到"LeaveHomeSafe"，對於政府咁唔愛國，覺得好唔開心。

不過政府好關心市民，睇下要求既permissions.

This app has access to:
📷Device & app history
retrieve running apps (睇下你行緊乜嘢app)
📷Photos/Media/Files
read the contents of your USB storage (睇下你電話有乜嘢檔案)
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage (幫你delete 不良檔案）
📷Storage
read the contents of your USB storage
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
📷Camera
take pictures and videos （幫你影相，要影QR code 嘛）
📷Wi-Fi connection information
view Wi-Fi connections （唔止想要知你有無駁Internet, 重想知你駁住乜嘢Wifi）
Other
receive data from Internet
view network connections （當然想知你用緊345G 定Wifi 定有無用緊VPN)
allow Wi-Fi Multicast reception (政府重識得親切地發multicast packet, 智慧燈柱？）
full network access
run at startup （boot 機就啟動，驚你唔記得開）
control vibration
prevent device from sleeping
Google Play license check

replies.msg:
先假設呢個app冇古惑，再去睇潛在風險
retrieve running apps
將來可配合其他政府app，又可以睇你有冇用tg/vpn/etc，唔建議allow

read the contents of your USB storage
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
唔通影完啲qr code唔可以喺app到開/改/del咩

take pictures and videos
要影QR code

view Wi-Fi connections
view network connections
咁知你係用緊data同wifi都要掛，唔通你用緊data仲狂download數據咩
不過呢樣係有風險，有機會分析到你去過邊，自行考慮

receive data from Internet
呢個唔洗解釋啦

allow Wi-Fi Multicast reception
Er...唔allow嘅話你個網絡要將啲message逐個send...
照計你唔好連去政府WiFi就安全

full network access
run at startup
個app係要通知你嘅，如果你著機唔手動開app就收唔到，咁就廢晒
control vibration
prevent device from sleeping
Google Play license check

quote.msg:
隔離post抄出嚟

係Google Play Store 搵唔到《安心出行》只搵到"LeaveHomeSafe"，對於政府咁唔愛國，覺得好唔開心。

不過政府好關心市民，睇下要求既permissions.

This app has access to:
📷Device & app history
retrieve running apps (睇下你行緊乜嘢app)
📷Photos/Media/Files
read the contents of your USB storage (睇下你電話有乜嘢檔案)
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage (幫你delete 不良檔案）
📷Storage
read the contents of your USB storage
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
📷Camera
take pictures and videos （幫你影相，要影QR code 嘛）
📷Wi-Fi connection information
view Wi-Fi connections （唔止想要知你有無駁Internet, 重想知你駁住乜嘢Wifi）
Other
receive data from Internet
view network connections （當然想知你用緊345G 定Wifi 定有無用緊VPN)
allow Wi-Fi Multicast reception (政府重識得親切地發multicast packet, 智慧燈柱？）
full network access
run at startup （boot 機就啟動，驚你唔記得開）
control vibration
prevent device from sleeping
Google Play license check
